meeting_annotations.speaker: Jenny Yang
meeting_annotations.transcript: So uh we've we're we're actually writing a review on the topic. So the best quinone that the delta K EQ is 10 to the 15. And so if we plot the log of um the binding constant versus the redox potential we get a linear free energy relationship which basically just means that as we go more negative we bind better but obviously more negative means more oxygen sensitive. And so we're basically trying to find ways to get off that line uh so to speak right um so basically try to find ways to improve the nucleophilicity uh without um improving the potential.
